    • Method Detail

      • isNetworkUp

        public static boolean isNetworkUp()
        Returns:
        true if at least one network interface is up

      • resolveAll

        public static InetAddress[] resolveAll(String host,
                       int timeOut)
                                throws UnknownHostException
        Resolves hostname to its IP address(s) unless the time out
        Parameters:
        host - Host name to resolve
        timeOut - Timeout duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the list of resolved IP adresses for the given host name
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException - if no address are known for this host

      • resolveHost

        public static InetAddress resolveHost(String host,
                      int timeOut)
                               throws UnknownHostException
        Resolves hostname to its IP address unless the timeout delay is reached
        Parameters:
        host - Host name to resolve
        timeOut - Timeout duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        the IP address of the given host
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException

      • isHostReachable

        public static boolean isHostReachable(String host,
                      int timeOut)
                               throws UnknownHostException,
                                      IOException
        Resolves hostname and check if accessible with InetAddress.isReachable(int)
        Parameters:
        host - Host name to resolve and test for reachability
        timeOut - Timeout duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if host is reachable
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException
        IOException

      • isHostReachable

        public static boolean isHostReachable(String host,
                      int port,
                      int timeOut)
                               throws UnknownHostException,
                                      IOException
        Resolves hostname and check if accessible on specified port
        Parameters:
        host - Host name to resolve and test for reachability
        port - TCP port to connect to
        timeOut - Timeout duration in milliseconds
        Returns:
        true if host is reachable on this port
        Throws:
        UnknownHostException
        IOException
